verbs.description: [V: rensselaer] county launches helpline for battling addiction rensselaer county launched a helpline this week for residents who are struggling with addiction and do n't know where to turn for help the line 1 - 833-hope-123 is open every day from 9 a m to 9 p m and staffed by roughly 30 volunteers on rotating shifts rensselaer county sheriff pat russo troy heroin maryfran wachunas heroin coalition addiction america rensselaer county new york co - chair columbia county
